pkgmetadata.longdescription: Echogram Visualisation and Analysis // Easily import multi- frequency acoustic data stored in 'HAC' files (see http://biblio.uqar.ca/archives/30005500.pdf for more information on the format), and produce echogram visualisations with predefined or customized color palettes. It is also possible to merge consecutive echograms; mask or delete unwanted echogram areas; model and subtract background noise; and more important, develop, test and interpret different combinations of frequencies in order to perform acoustic filtering of the echogram's data.
